turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started. how many pizzas did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have four small pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The buffalo chicken with barbecue sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like bella luna has buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could we do bacon, sausage, and pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, did you want those toppings for all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All four pizzas and can I have extra cheese on all of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your order of 4 small pizzas, all bacon sausage and pepperoni and all with extra cheese comes out to $42.34.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order, it'll be ready for pick up in 24 mins.
